settings.text:
Stays fresh in your pantry. No freezing required.

Our complete & balanced meals are prepared with all-natural real ingredients and zero preservatives to help dogs lead longer, happier lives.

settings.title: Vet-Formulated Recipes
settings.text: Our recipes aren't just delicious - they're designed by vets to combat health and digestive problems

settings.title: Real Ingredients
settings.text: 100% all-natural ingredients exceed all AFFCO standards and provide complete and balanced nutrition

settings.title: No Freezing Required
settings.text: Our revolutionary Steam & Pressure preparation process means meals stay fresh in your pantry for up to 2 years

settings.title: See a Difference With Your First Order

settings.heading: The Best Nutrition at the Best Price
Half the Cost of Just Food for Dogs
settings.content: Priced per pound, we offer healthier recipes at a lower cost than Just Food For Dogs, Ziwi Peak, and Blue Buffalo

settings.heading: Cooked in USDA Certified Kitchens
settings.content: All our food is hand-made in a kitchen regulated by the United States Department of Agriculture.

settings.heading: Real Ingredients, Simple Recipes
settings.content: There's no mystery to our recipes, just high-quality, all-natural ingredients.

settings.heading: Every Order Feeds a Rescue Dog
settings.content: We donate healthy food, supplies, and medical assistance to animal rescues across America.

settings.title: Melanie Glenn & Husky, Romeo
settings.text: “Romeo goes crazy for all three Happy Howl recipes! I feel great knowing I’m feeding my dog the right amount of food and giving him fresh fruit, vegetables, and protein that kibble can’t match.”

settings.title: Victor Nicastro & Beagle, Gus
settings.text: “I have never seen Gus enjoy a bowl of food like he did with Happy Howl. It looked and smelled so good that we thought it was made for actual humans!”

settings.title: Julia Feschcenko & Golden Retriever, Wilfred
settings.text: “My puppy absolutely loves it. He usually gets an upset stomach after his meals, but not with Happy Howl. This is a huge win for us!”
